backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing events with CRUD operations and programme overview metadata.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing required update to ProgrammeSection and associated components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions with OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component rendering all sections, clearing localStorage, and handling admin overlay state.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanelOverla: Overlay admin panel with password check that displays stored queries or registrations from localStorage.
frontend/src/components/NavBar.tsx: Fixed navigation bar with smooth-scroll buttons and an admin trigger.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section with fade‑in animation, descriptive text, and Vision/Mission cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/AdminPa: Inline admin panel section allowing password-gated viewing of stored queries or registrations.
frontend/src/components/sections/Committ: Renders an organizing committee section with fade‑in animation and cards listing member roles and contact details.
frontend/src/components/sections/FooterS: Displays a simple footer showing the current year and event name.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Creates the landing hero section with event title, date, and tagline using fade‑in animation.
frontend/src/components/sections/index.t: Exports all section components from a single index file for easier imports.
frontend/src/components/sections/Program: Shows a three‑day programme schedule with themed days and detailed time‑based activities.
frontend/src/components/sections/QuerySe: Contains a form for submitting queries, storing entries in localStorage and using fade‑in animation.
frontend/src/components/sections/Registr: Provides a school registration form that saves submissions to localStorage with visual fade‑in behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages creation and caching of authenticated or anonymous backend actors, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFadeInOnScroll.ts: Adds a fade‑in‑visible class to a referenced element when it enters the viewport using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for React Query hooks with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes, plus utility classes like Orbitron font and fade‑in animations.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a helper function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/utils/localStorageArrays.ts: Provides helper functions to append to and read arrays stored in localStorage with JSON parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme colors based on CSS variables, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores metadata about project state, existing features, and pending requests for publishing the updated Programme Overview.
